name: Design system roadmap planning
description:
Delivery Hero's Armor design system is a community driven system catering to the needs of our internal products.


We came up with this framework to plan our roadmap and wanted to share with you all. If you are planning a roadmap for your design system, give it a try. The steps are as follows:


  1. List the participants
  2. Write the tasks in buckets
  3. Arrange them in Impact / Effort graph


Buckets are groups to help you understand where the system team should focus their energy on.


Use it and let me know how to improve it.
